DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Asia . The primary objective study evaluate clinical safety profile 26 week NovoNorm® ( repaglinide ) insulin analogue combination therapy type 2 diabetes normal clinical practice condition Korea secondary objective evaluate safety efficacy 13 26 week NovoNorm® insulin analogue combination therapy type 2 diabetes normal clinical practice condition Korea .
DOC.brief_title: Observational , Safety Study NovoNorm® ( Repaglinide ) Insulin Analogue Combination Therapy Type 2 Diabetes Korea
